summary: Completed testing of CanineCompass V2 new features: Multi-trainer booking calculator (50% deposit system) and Dog Equipment Shop (31 products, 8 categories). All 13 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified with full functionality working.

equipment_categories_api.returns: 8 categories (harnesses, grooming, training, bowls, beds, toys, health, travel)

features: Calculates cost breakdown for multiple trainers
Includes K9 risk fee (£10.79) when include_k9_risk_fee=true

verified_features: Hero section: 'Book Your Personal K9 Training Team'
Badges: AI Verified, Book 7-10 Days Ahead, 50% Deposit
Pricing cards: Virtual (£81/hr), Home Visit (£180/hr), Emergency 24/7 (£1,619.99)
Our K9 Team section with 3 trainers (Available Now badge)
Add to Booking buttons for multi-trainer selection
K9 Risk fee notice (£10.79 for dangerous dogs)
Cost calculator with deposit/full payment options
Badges: Vetted Suppliers, UK Delivery, Enquiry Based
Product cards with display_price and ratings
Enquire Now buttons on all products

mocked_apis.Equipment Purchases: Enquiry-based only - no actual Stripe checkout for equipment

critical_code_review_comments: All pricing includes hidden service fees as required (20% trainer, 22% equipment)
50% deposit system correctly implemented with remaining_balance calculation
7-10 day advance booking validation working correctly
Equipment enquiry system is MOCKED as specified - no actual checkout
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - products and trainers loaded from static DOG_EQUIPMENT_CATALOG and OUR_K9_TEAM
context_for_next_testing_agent: BookK9Trainer page at /book-trainer shows multi-trainer selection with cost calculator. Equipment Shop at /equipment shows 31 products across 8 categories. Equipment purchases are ENQUIRY-BASED ONLY (MOCKED). Trainer IDs for Our K9 Team: team_001, team_002, team_003.
